attributes.action: Appoint Jackie Weaver to the Cabinet of the UK Government
attributes.additional_details: It is vital that talented individuals with strong leadership skills are harnessed for the good of society. Jackie Weaver has demonstrated all of the qualities required to assume high office and we urge the government to appoint her in, at the very least, an advisory capacity.
attributes.background: We demand that Jackie Weaver is appointed as a member of the UK Government's cabinet following her display of exceptional leadership during the recent Handforth Parish Council meeting that went viral.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes requests for specific individuals to be appointed to the Cabinet.
